title: Back into the sun
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Medical care
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Psychology
description: Illustrates how the hospital of the Allen Memorial Institute in Montreal helps patients back to mental and emotional health. The case presented is of a woman who is under severe emotional distress. Interviews with a psychiatrist and group therapy sessions show her the root of her trouble, and set her on the right path to overcoming her problem.
